channel.title: [RuneSource 317]Equipment
channel.description:
Note: I'm not showing you here how to add the special attack interface.
Protocol: 317 Base: RuneSource Length: 1/10 Difficulty: 1/10
Okay, so here's what we are going to change:
When you wear an item, let's say Rune Scimitar 5698 ID), this is how's the sidebar interface going to look:
Before: [img]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/1991/interfaceequip.png[/img]
After: [img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/9173/ddsequip.png[/img]
Tutorial:
[b]Step 1:[/b]
Open the "equipdefs" class, and search for 5698. You will see something like this: [code] <equip> <id>5698</id> <bonuses> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonuses> <standAnim>0x328</standAnim> <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim> <runAnim>0x338</runAnim> <attackStyles> </attackStyles> <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim> <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed> <interfaceId>0</interfaceId> <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface> <soundId>0</soundId> </equip> [/code]
DDS item ID/code [code]<id>5698</id>[/code]
DDS Bonuses [code]<bonuses> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonuses>[/code]
DDS animation while standing, walking running, and in defence mode. Interface id : 0 - Equipment interface [code]<standAnim>0x328</standAnim> <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim> <runAnim>0x338</runAnim> <attackStyles> </attackStyles> <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim> <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed> <interfaceId>0</interfaceId> <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface> <soundId>0</soundId>[/code]
So this is what are you going to change: [code]<interfaceId>0</interfaceId>[/code]
The interface id should be set up to 2276, only if you are using battleaxes or staffs/bows there's an other Interface ID.
So here's how your code should look now: [code] <equip> <id>5698</id> <bonuses> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonuses> <standAnim>0x328</standAnim> <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim> <runAnim>0x338</runAnim> <attackStyles> </attackStyles> <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim> <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed> <interfaceId>2276</interfaceId> <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface> <soundId>0</soundId> </equip>[/code]
Okay, here, some codes for ur staffs.
Search for : 4675
Change it whole with:
[code]<equip> <id>4675</id> <bonuses> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonuses> <standAnim>0x328</standAnim> <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim> <runAnim>0x338</runAnim> <attackStyles> </attackStyles> <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim> <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed> <interfaceId>328</interfaceId> <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface> <soundId>0</soundId> </equip> [/code]
Change 1381,1383,1385,1387 with:
[code]<id>1381</id> <bonuses> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonuses> <standAnim>0x328</standAnim> <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim> <runAnim>0x338</runAnim> <attackStyles> <accurate>424</accurate> </attackStyles> <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim> <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed> <interfaceId>328</interfaceId> <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface> <soundId>0</soundId> </equip> <equip> <id>1383</id> <bonuses> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonuses> <standAnim>0x328</standAnim> <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim> <runAnim>0x338</runAnim> <attackStyles> </attackStyles> <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim> <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed> <interfaceId>328</interfaceId> <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface> <soundId>0</soundId> </equip> <equip> <id>1385</id> <bonuses> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonuses> <standAnim>0x328</standAnim> <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim> <runAnim>0x338</runAnim> <attackStyles> </attackStyles> <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim> <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed> <interfaceId>328</interfaceId> <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface> <soundId>0</soundId> </equip> <equip> <id>1387</id> <bonuses> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonuses> <standAnim>0x328</standAnim> <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim> <runAnim>0x338</runAnim> <attackStyles> </attackStyles> <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim> <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed> <interfaceId>328</interfaceId> <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface> <soundId>0</soundId> </equip> [/code]
[b]Credits: [/b] [ul][li]I Roll Deep[/li][/ul]

item.title: [RuneSource 317]Equipment
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

Note: I’m not showing you here how to add the special attack interface.

Protocol: 317
Base: RuneSource
Length: 1/10
Difficulty: 1/10

Okay, so here’s what we are going to change:

When you wear an item, let’s say Rune Scimitar 5698 ID), this is how’s the sidebar interface going to look:

Before:

After:

Tutorial:

Step 1:

Open the “equipdefs” class, and search for 5698.
You will see something like this:

<equip>
<id>5698</id>
      <bonuses>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
      </bonuses>
      <standAnim>0x328</standAnim>
      <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim>
      <runAnim>0x338</runAnim>
      <attackStyles>
      </attackStyles>
      <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim>
      <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed>
      <interfaceId>0</interfaceId>
      <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface>
      <soundId>0</soundId>
   </equip>

DDS item ID/code

DDS Bonuses

<bonuses> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonuses>

DDS animation while standing, walking running, and in defence mode.
Interface id : 0 - Equipment interface

<standAnim>0x328</standAnim> <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim> <runAnim>0x338</runAnim> <attackStyles> </attackStyles> <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim> <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed> <interfaceId>0</interfaceId> <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface> <soundId>0</soundId>

So this is what are you going to change:

The interface id should be set up to 2276, only if you are using battleaxes or staffs/bows there’s an other Interface ID.

So here’s how your code should look now:

<equip>
<id>5698</id>
      <bonuses>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
      </bonuses>
      <standAnim>0x328</standAnim>
      <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim>
      <runAnim>0x338</runAnim>
      <attackStyles>
      </attackStyles>
      <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim>
      <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed>
      <interfaceId>2276</interfaceId>
      <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface>
      <soundId>0</soundId>
   </equip>[/code]

Okay, here, some codes for ur staffs.

Search for : 4675

Change it whole with:

[code]<equip>
      <id>4675</id>
      <bonuses>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
         <int>0</int>
      </bonuses>
      <standAnim>0x328</standAnim>
      <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim>
      <runAnim>0x338</runAnim>
      <attackStyles>
      </attackStyles>
      <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim>
      <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed>
      <interfaceId>328</interfaceId>
      <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface>
      <soundId>0</soundId>
   </equip>

Change 1381,1383,1385,1387 with:

<id>1381</id> <bonuses> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonuses> <standAnim>0x328</standAnim> <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim> <runAnim>0x338</runAnim> <attackStyles> <accurate>424</accurate> </attackStyles> <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim> <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed> <interfaceId>328</interfaceId> <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface> <soundId>0</soundId> </equip> <equip> <id>1383</id> <bonuses> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonuses> <standAnim>0x328</standAnim> <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim> <runAnim>0x338</runAnim> <attackStyles> </attackStyles> <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim> <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed> <interfaceId>328</interfaceId> <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface> <soundId>0</soundId> </equip> <equip> <id>1385</id> <bonuses> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonuses> <standAnim>0x328</standAnim> <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim> <runAnim>0x338</runAnim> <attackStyles> </attackStyles> <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim> <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed> <interfaceId>328</interfaceId> <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface> <soundId>0</soundId> </equip> <equip> <id>1387</id> <bonuses> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonuses> <standAnim>0x328</standAnim> <walkAnim>0x333</walkAnim> <runAnim>0x338</runAnim> <attackStyles> </attackStyles> <defenseAnim>0</defenseAnim> <weaponSpeed>0</weaponSpeed> <interfaceId>328</interfaceId> <specialAttackInterface>0</specialAttackInterface> <soundId>0</soundId> </equip>

Credits:

[ul][li]I Roll Deep[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
